description: This file defines a FastAPI router for handling Slack event callbacks, including verification, message processing, and message sending functions, integrating with external Slack tools and internal agent/team logic.

methods.name: get_sync_router
methods.description: Creates and returns a FastAPI APIRouter configured with Slack event handling endpoints.

methods.name: slack_events
methods.description: Handles incoming Slack event POST requests, verifies signatures, and processes message events asynchronously.

methods.name: _process_slack_event
methods.description: Processes individual Slack message events, invoking agent or team logic and sending responses.

methods.name: _send_slack_message
methods.description: Sends messages to Slack channels, handling message length limits and formatting.
